datagen = ImageDataGenerator(fill_mode = "constant", height_shift_range=0.05, width_shift_range=0.05, rotation_range=90, horizontal_flip=True,vertical_flip=True)

#Source path of image folder
fpath = '../input/bitter-gourd-images-from-augmentation/fresh_bitter_gourd'

#destination folder in which augmentted images will be stored
a = 'fresh_bitter_gourd'

#Parent folder of destination
des = './Fresh_Augmented'

if not os.path.exists(des+ '/' +a):
    os.makedirs(des+ '/' +a)
des_path = os.path.join(des,a)

for img_path in os.listdir(fpath):
    path = os.path.join(fpath,img_path)
    img = load_img(path, target_size=(512,512))
    # convert to numpy array
    data = img_to_array(img)
    # expand dimension to one sample
    samples = np.expand_dims(data, 0)

    i = 0
    for batch in datagen.flow(samples, batch_size=1,
                  save_to_dir=des_path, save_prefix=img_path, save_format='jpg'):
        i += 1
        
        # Here 10 refers to 10 augementations per image
        if i > 10:
            break
